name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Stalkers_Guile_E
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Stalkers Guile E
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Stalkers and can be slotted into nearly all Stalker damage powers.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
